creator: Serhii Korovayny
caption: As water supply system was damaged during the fighting, people of Toretsk have to get water from the water stations. Toretsk is a small coal mine town near the frontline in Donetsk region. Since 2014, people here has been living with the war next door, as the nearest city of Horlivka was occuped by Russians. There are approximately 17 thousands people living in Toretsk and nearest villages now.
